description: Defines SNMP statistics and notifications specific to the MATRIXX Engine.

panels.description: voiceChargingStatsAnnouncementCompleteCount - Number of announcements successfully played to the caller.
panels.title: Number of announcements successfully played to the caller.

panels.description: voiceChargingStatsScriptCount- Number of attempts to run a VXML script.
panels.title: Number of attempts to run a VXML script.

panels.description: voiceChargingStatsScriptCompleteCount - Number of VXML scripts successfully run.
panels.title: Number of VXML scripts successfully run.

panels.description: voiceChargingStatsCftActionForAcrCount - Number of sessions for which charging failure action was applied on receipt of an ApplyChargingReport.
panels.title: Sessions charging failure applied on receipt of ApplyChargingReport

panels.description: Number of sessions ended due to route select failure.
panels.title: Voice Session ended due to Route Select Failure

panels.description:
voiceChargingStatsAcrTimeoutCount
 - Number of sessions timed out waiting for ApplyChargingReport.
panels.title: Number of sessions timed out waiting for ApplyChargingReport.

panels.description: The average number of transactions, per second, processed by the Charging Server
panels.title: Transaction average by Charging Server

panels.description: Number of sessions for which charging server granted some time and ApplyCharging was sent
panels.title: Sessions Charging Server granted time and applied charging

panels.description: Number of sessions ended due to no answer.
panels.title: Number of sessions ended due to no answer.

panels.description: Number of ATI TCAP ABORTS received
panels.title: Number of ATI TCAP ABORTS received

panels.description: Number of ATI TCAP NOTICEs received
panels.title: Number of ATI TCAP NOTICES received

title: MATRIXX Engine Performance
